mapper.select:
SELECT ID AS id ,rri.loan_no AS loanNo ,rri.loan_name AS loanName, rri.charge_date AS chargeDate ,rri.charge_result AS chargeResult, rri.charge_lose_reason AS chargeLoseReason, rri.charge_channel AS chargeChannel, rri.source_table AS chargeType , rri.branch_org as branchOrg FROM REPORT_RESLOVE_INFO rri where 1=1
and charge_date like '%'|| #{parameter.synDate} ||'%'

SELECT ri.pri_number AS priNumber FROM REPORT_ZJ_BATCH_BACUK ri WHERE 1=1 and ri.request_no = '4'
AND to_char(ri.create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{parameter.synDate}

SELECT ri.pri_number AS priNumber FROM REPORT_INTERFACE_LOG_BACK ri WHERE 1=1
AND to_char(ri.create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{parameter.synDate}

insert.foreach:
INSERT INTO REPORT_INTERFACE_LOG_BACK ( PRI_NUMBER , INTERFACE_CONTENT , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_NAME , LOAN_CONTRACT_NO , SEQ , STATUS , BRANCH_ORG , LOAN_NAME )
VALUES ( #{item.priNumber} , #{item.interfaceContent} , #{item.createDate} , #{item.createName} , #{item.loanContractNo} , #{item.seq} , #{item.status} , #{item.branchOrg} , #{item.loanName} )

mapper.select:
SELECT ri.pri_number AS priNumber ,ri.request_no AS requestNo , ri.batch_no AS batchNo , ri.interface_content AS interfaceContent, ri.create_date AS createDate , ri.create_name AS createName FROM REPORT_ZJ_BATCH_BACUK ri WHERE 1=1 and RESLOVE_FLAG = '0' and FLAG = '1' and ri.request_no = '4'
AND to_char(ri.create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{parameter.synDate}

SELECT id , PARENT_ID AS parentId ,NAME AS NAME , URL AS url , ICON AS icon , DISPLAY_ORDER AS displayOrder , PATH AS path , NOTE AS note , LOCKED AS locked
FROM stf_res_menu

insert.foreach:
INSERT INTO REPORT_RESLOVE_INFO ( id , loan_no , loan_name , charge_date , charge_result , charge_lose_reason , charge_channel , account_number , amount , branch_org , source_table , RESLOVE_DATE , charge_code )
VALUES ( sys_guid() , #{item.itemNo} , #{item.accountName} , #{item.bankTxTime} , #{item.status} , #{item.responseMessage} , #{item.chargeChannel} , #{item.accountNumber} , #{item.amount} , #{item.branchOrg} , 'REPORT_ZJ_BATCH_BACUK' ,SYSDATE , #{item.chargeCode} )

INSERT INTO REPORT_RESLOVE_INFO ( id , loan_no , loan_name , charge_date , charge_result , charge_lose_reason , charge_channel , branch_org , source_table ,RESLOVE_DATE , charge_code )
VALUES ( sys_guid() , #{item.loanNo ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.loanName ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.bankTxTime ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.status ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.responseMessage ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.chargeChannel ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.branchOrg ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 'REPORT_INTERFACE_LOG_BACK' ,SYSDATE , #{item.chargeCode} )

INSERT INTO REPORT_RESLOVE_INFO ( id , loan_no , loan_name , charge_date , charge_result , charge_lose_reason , charge_channel , branch_org , source_table , RESLOVE_DATE , charge_code )
VALUES ( sys_guid() , #{item.loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.loanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.succTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.respCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.respMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.chargeChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.branchOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 'REPORT_INTERFACE_LOG_BACK' , SYSDATE , #{item.chargeCode} )

INSERT INTO REPORT_RESLOVE_INFO ( id , loan_no , loan_name , charge_date , charge_result , charge_lose_reason , charge_channel , branch_org , source_table , RESLOVE_DATE , charge_code )
VALUES ( sys_guid() , #{item.loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.loanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.trade_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.resp_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.resp_msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.chargeChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.branchOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 'REPORT_INTERFACE_LOG_BACK' , SYSDATE , #{item.chargeCode} )

mapper.update:
UPDATE REPORT_ZJ_BATCH_BACUK a SET RESLOVE_FLAG = '1' WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT priNumber AS priNumber FROM
select #{item.priNumber} as priNumber from dual
where a.pri_number =listData.priNumber
)
